name: Dinari V
description: Dinari V dShares (V.d) represent 1:1 ownership of shares in VISA Inc., a global leader in digital payments technology and one of the largest payment processing networks in the world. Each V.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Visa share securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, Dinari’s dShares provide investors with enhanced accessibility, fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and improved liquidity, enabling a modern and efficient way to invest in Visa’s equity.
